COMMENT_OBS: The Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) comprises an area which extends either from the coast, or in federal systems from the seaward boundaries of the constituent states (3 to 12 nautical miles, in most cases) to 200 nautical miles (370 kilometres) off the coa

The Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) comprises an area which extends either from the coast, or in federal systems from the seaward boundaries of the constituent states (3 to 12 nautical miles, in most cases) to 200 nautical miles (370 kilometres) off the coa
SOURCE_DETAIL: Protected Planet: The World Database on Protected Areas (WDPA) [On-line], December, 2018, International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN) and United Nations Environment Programme's World Conservation Monitoring Centre (UNEP-WCMC).
